text: Club Deportes Tolima, commonly known as Deportes Tolima, is a Colombian professional football club based in Ibagué, Tolima Department. It currently plays in the Categoría Primera A. The club was founded on 18 December 1954 and has won the league two times: in 2003 and 2018. title: Deportes Tolima
